caseName: Mickelson v. Chase Home Finance LLC

recap_documents.description: ORDER granting  43  Defendants Motion to Dismiss. The Court DISMISSES all of the waived claims with prejudice as to all Defendants. The DTA claims against all defendants except Chicago and NTS are also DISMISSED with prejudice. The Court also DISMISSES the CPA claims against MERS, Chase, JPMorgan, and Freddie Mac without prejudice. The Court does not rule on whether the CPA claims against the other defendants who joined in the motion are adequately pleaded by Judge Marsha J. Pechman.(MD)

caseName: Gilmore v. Saratoga Center for Care LLC

recap_documents.description: DECISION AND ORDER: It is hereby ORDERED that the #  36     MOTION to Dismiss for Failure to State a Claim   filed by Saratoga Center for Care LLC, Danielle Zastawny is DENIED without prejudice to re-filing. Defendant may file a renewed motion  to dismiss within fourteen days of the date of this order. If Defendant files such a motion, the Court will set a briefing schedule. If Defendant fails to file such a motion, Defendant shall file an answer to the Complaint within 21 days of the date  of this order. Plaintiff's #  40  letter motion seeking an update on the status of Defendant's motion is hereby DENIED as moot. The above decision and order provides that update.  Signed by Senior Judge Thomas J. McAvoy on 4/25/2022. {Copy served upon pro se Plaintiff via regular mail}(pjh, )
